name: Hunt
description: She was a student at the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań, at the Faculty of Pedagogy and Artistic Studies in Kalisz. In 2010 she won the main prize in the Chopin Image art competition in the Oleśnicki Poviat. In 2015 she obtained a diploma of completion of first-cycle studies in painting. In 2017 she received her title Master of art.
